
# uredivanje podataka
```{r}
data$track_album_release_date <- as.Date(data$track_album_release_date)   # mozda posix
factcols <- c("playlist_genre", "playlist_subgenre", "playlist_name", "track_artist", "mode")
data[factcols] <- lapply(data[factcols], as.factor)

```
